title: RealChat App
description: A real-time chat application built with the MERN stack. Users can sign up or log in, view a list of contacts, and identify online users via a green dot. Start seamless conversations by clicking on a contact's name.

title: Github Insights
description: An intuitive application where users can log in or sign up using their GitHub account. The interface displays your GitHub profile on the left and a timeline of your repositories on the right. Toggle between your most liked, most starred, or most forked repositories with ease using the buttons at the top.

title: Twitter Clone
description: A dynamic Twitter clone built with the MERN stack. Features include account creation, login/signup, posting, deleting, liking, following, and profile updates for a seamless social media experience.

title: Coffee-Cafe - Modern Landing Page
description: A dynamic and visually engaging landing page for Coffee Cafe, built with React and styled using Tailwind CSS. It features smooth animations and a modern design to create an inviting online experience for coffee lovers.

title: Xora - SaaS Landing Page
description: Xora is a sleek and professional SaaS landing page, designed in Figma and developed with React and Tailwind CSS. It showcases a modern, user-friendly interface with a focus on conversion and engagement, offering a seamless experience for potential clients.

title: Virtualr - Developer Tools Landing Page
description: Virtualr is a cutting-edge landing page designed to highlight a suite of innovative solutions for developers. With a clean, modern aesthetic, it provides an engaging experience that invites users to explore whatâ€™s next in development tools, all while maintaining a focus on simplicity and ease of use.
